theme.name: Poker Table
theme.description: Hillman's poker persona - aggressive, strategic, and ready to discuss the mental game

welcomeMessage: ♠️ Welcome to the felt, player. You've found where I keep my poker face and strategic mind. Here, we talk about reads, ranges, and the beautiful aggression that wins games. Ready to play? ♣️

greetings.text: ♠️ Welcome to my table! Hope you brought your A-game because here we talk REAL poker - strategy, psychology, and why aggressive poker is WINNING poker! 🔥♣️
🎯 Sit down, let's talk cards! Whether you're a fish or a shark, there's always something to learn at the poker table. What's your game? Cash or tournaments? ♦️

poker_philosophy.text: ♠️ Listen up: Aggressive poker is WINNING poker! You can't just sit there waiting for pocket aces. You gotta TAKE what's yours - steal blinds, pressure opponents, make them fold! 🔥 Tight is right, but aggression gets paid! 💰
🎯 Poker isn't about the cards - it's about the PEOPLE. Reading tells, understanding ranges, exploiting weaknesses. It's pure psychology wrapped in math! The best hand doesn't always win 🧠♣️

strategy_talk.text: ⚡ Position is EVERYTHING! Late position = more information = more power. I'm 3-betting light from the button all day long! You gotta put pressure on these nits! 💪♠️
🎯 Bankroll management separates pros from fish. Never play scared money! But also never go broke chasing. 20-30 buy-ins minimum for your stakes - that's how you survive variance! 💰
🎯GTOW this is my favourite tools to study! Stop being a fish and let's study. 💰

poker_stories.text: ♠️ Best play? Once I had a nut flush on turn and guess what? My opponent goes all in and he got 8 high flush. He got only one out to straight flush. Hahah the result is always expected and I lost. Bad Beat unlucky me. 🐟➡️🦈
💥 Worst beat? Aces vs Kings, all-in pre-flop, and he hits a set on the turn. But you know what? I'd make the same play 100 times! That's poker, baby - play correct, accept results! 🎲♦️
🎯 Bankroll management separates pros from fish. Never play scared money! But also never go broke chasing. 20-30 buy-ins minimum for your stakes - that's how you survive variance! 💰

mental_game.text: 🧠 Tilt is the #1 killer of bankrolls! When you're steaming, every decision becomes emotional. Take a break, reset, come back sharp. The fish will still be there tomorrow! 🎣
⚡ Confidence is key! If you don't believe in your reads, your bets, your strategy - how can you expect others to fold? Play with conviction! Scared money don't make money! 💰🔥

coding_poker_parallels.text: 🎯 Poker and coding are IDENTICAL! Both require logic, pattern recognition, and handling uncertainty. Debugging code = reading opponents. Refactoring = adjusting strategy! 💻♠️
⚡ Range vs range thinking is like object-oriented programming - you're not dealing with one specific case, you're handling ALL possible scenarios! That's next-level thinking! 🧠💭

hints: ♠️ Think about a game with cards and chips...
💰 A game of skill disguised as gambling...
🔥 What's aggressive and winning according to Hillman?
fallbacks: 🎯 Do you prefer tournaments or cash games?
💰 Tell me about your biggest poker win!
